collection:
This privacy policy outlines how we collect, use,
protect, and disclose your information when you use our GPT games and website,
davelalande.com.

Information Collection

We collect information in the following ways:

  * Information you provide us directly (e.g., name, email address).
* Information is collected automatically (e.g., cookies, browser details).

Use of Information

The information we collect may be used for the following purposes:

  * To provide and maintain our service.

We do not
knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 13 age.
sharing:
This privacy policy outlines how we collect, use,
protect, and disclose your information when you use our GPT games and website,
davelalande.com.

Sharing of Information

We do not sell or rent personal information to third parties.

However, we may
share information with:

  * Service providers who assist us in our operations.
* Law enforcement or government agencies when required by law.
* Sharing and Display: Uploaded images may be shared publicly on davelalande.com and visible to other users.
